data.eml:eml: Key to the species of Ptilomerinae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Gerridae) of Thailand and review of the fauna of the Tennaserim Mountain Range

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Raruanysong, Sajeemat, Vitheepradit, Akekawat, Sites, Robert W. (2014): Key to the species of Ptilomerinae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Gerridae) of Thailand and review of the fauna of the Tennaserim Mountain Range. Zootaxa 3852 (1): 101-117, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3852.1.4
